name: Bad Impressions
description:
Bad Impressions is a game where you draw a character card and a scenario card and you have to improvise how that character would react to the situation. Hundreds of cards gives thousands of unique scenarios. Do your best impression whether that means using the voice of the character or just channeling their spirit.

Will Joker have to read a children's book? Will Joe Biden have to convince his wife to have a threesome? You don't know until you draw the cards.

Multiple rule sets give you the ability to play different ways. Whether you want teams, everyone doing the same scenario or a classic competition, we have a rule set for you.
